_header: Man behold what I for thee
Subjects: paraphrases; Christ, Passion of; Christ, appeal of, to man
_description: A paraphrase of ‘O homo vide quid pro te pacior’, etc. — sixteen short lines

BLHar913.First Lines:
Man bi hold what ic for þe þolid up þe rode treNe
                    man no kinnes wo be mare þan min was þo ic heng
                    þair…
BLHar913.Last Lines:
…Wiþ vte ic was ipinid sore wiþ in ic was mochil
                    moreFor þou nelt þonk me þe loue þt ich schowid
                    þe
BLHar913.Note: Two verse lines per manuscript line
